text:
Are you able to instantly tell whether clothes will suit you
when you browse through them one after another like that?

Ehh?
Can't you normally tell with just a glance?
Like, you feel a spark of inspiration?
I guess that's how it is.

If you'd like, I could put together an outfit
for you, Producer.

Eh? R-Really?
Then, maybe I'll take you up on that offer────

Something funky, dangerous, and super flashy
like this would be good I think.

On second though,
maybe I'll wait for another time... Hahaha
